project.projectDes: We have said that the problem is to specify the recognition process economically. This involves knowing about the email signal we wish to recognise in order to specify the processing required by the machine. The most striking aspect of email, which achieves its full impact when ASR is considered.

task.description: After training th emodel we need to test the using test data set whether the outputs are valid or not
to select with model will be perfect here mostly btw supervised or unsupervised
Collecting the all mails which are leabled is hard and we need to processes that data
we can divide test data data and training data in many ways, mostly we will divide in 20:80 ratio
Training the test data can be in many types like KNN and Decision-Tree, we need to select best in that
